title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-B - Affidavit identifying party (private-placement)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 8-B - Affidavit identifying party (private-placement)

State Regulations
22 NYCRR
207.55
(b)(2) Form 8-B
(Affidavit

Identifying Party-
Private-Placement)
12/97
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of Adoption of (Docket)
(File) No. A Child Whose First Name Is
[FN1]AFFIDAVIT
IDENTIFYING PARTY
(Private-Placement)
________
STATE OF NEW YORK)
)ss.: COUNTY OF)
[FN2](That (s)he is an attorney at law
duly licensed to practice under the laws of the State of New York and has (his)
(her) office at;)

That (s)he knows (and
) and knows that (s)he (they (is) (are)
the same person(s) described in and who executed the annexed (and who (is)
(are) now present before the Court). ______________
Affiant

Sworn to before me this day of, 19. ______________
Judge of the Court
[FN1] Where the affiant is not the
attorney of record. [FN2] Delete if
inapplicable

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form
8-B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
